ValidationRule.description: Phone Tree Extn field must contain only numeric values
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'API') ), NOT( ISBLANK( Phone_Tree_Extn__c ) ), NOT( ISNUMBER( Phone_Tree_Extn__c ) ) ), true, false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Phone Tree Extn should be numeric value only
